'''LEGO ''Minecraft'' Ideas''' is a ''Minecraft'' book authored by Shari Last and Julia March, detailing several [[LEGO Minecraft|LEGO ''Minecraft'']] building possibilities for children to create or be inspired by. It also includes a mini LEGO set.
== Synopsis ==
{{quote|Use your LEGO collection to bring your Minecraft builds to life. Inspire budding builders to design a [[Diamond Sword|diamond sword]], build a busy [[biome]], make a micro mob, create a [[creeper]] house, and much more. Challenge family and friends to exciting games that combine the best bits of Minecraft and LEGO building. Comes with a diver minifigure and all the bricks needed to build an exclusive LEGO Minecraft mini model of an aquatic scene. Get ready to play!}}{{citation needed}}
